Name: Version of Firmware
Description: Information on the version of firmware

Name: Moving Speed
Description: Lowest byte of Moving Speed (Moving Velocity)

Name: Torque Limit
Description: Lowest byte of Torque Limit (Goal Torque)

Name: Present Position
Description: Lowest byte of Current Position (Present Velocity)

Name: Moving
Description: Means if there is any movement

Name: Goal Torque
Description: Lowest byte of goal torque value
